thread.title: BRIEF-Guangdong Zhongsheng Pharmaceutical unit receives GMP certificate

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangdong Zhongsheng Pharmaceutical unit receives GMP certificate

organizations.name: reuters) - guangdong zhongsheng pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 31(Reuters) - Guangdong Zhongsheng Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says coâ€™s Guangdong-based wholly owned pharmaceutical unit received goods manufacture practice (GMP) certificate from Guangdong Food and Drug Administration, for tablet, hard capsule, oral suspension, soft capsule and pill
* Says valid period is until Jan. 18, 2023
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Ad9TvT
